item.title: Microsoft Azure
item.description: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

item.title: Jenkins
item.description: In agile development practices, developers need to integrate their work frequently to fix bugs or to create a new feature or functionality.

item.title: SAFe Scaled Agile
item.description: A Certified SAFe 5 Practitioner (SP) is a SAFe team member professional responsible for using Scrum, Kanban, and XP in a SAFe environment.
